de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.misc

Interface ExceptionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DiscoveryActivity, NetworkClient, SendActivity

    public interface ExceptionListener
    Interface for exception identification across threads

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onException(java.lang.Object origin, java.lang.Exception exception, java.lang.String info)
      Called when an exception cannot be gracefully handled.

    • Method Detail

      • onException

        void onException(java.lang.Object origin,
                 java.lang.Exception exception,
                 java.lang.String info)
        Called when an exception cannot be gracefully handled.
        Parameters:
        origin - the instance (or, if it is a hidden instance, the known parent) that produced the exception
        exception - the exception that was thrown
        info - additional information to help identify the problem
